short_description: Play as Waltynn, a waffle from the planet Hekta who lost control of his spaceship and crashed on the planet Lylo. Help him survive and escape the planet. As you explore the planet, you realize that you've landed right in the middle of a Apocalypse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphic Card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: The game will still work with lower system requirements but it will have a lower preformance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphic Card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
